channel.title: The Pudding
channel.description: The Pudding is an editorial publication that explains ideas debated in culture with visual essays.

item.description: A look at the global research effort to combat the coronavirus pandemic

item.description: We built a model that attempts to predict a wine’s quality

item.description: An essay about artificial and emotional intelligence and finding an ending

item.title: The Cultural Borders of Songs
item.description: We mapped last month’s #1 songs in 3,000 places.

item.description: An auditory comparison of 770 artists' live and studio tracks

item.title: We created a speaker rider. Journalism didn’t have one.
item.description: Everyone needs to work together to make events more inclusive.

item.description: Watch all 412 cools from Abed, and others.

item.description: A chronicle of a controversial cookie and condiment crossword clue.

item.description: Our sophisticated A.I. judges your awful taste in music.

item.title: Welcome to the Cloud Zoo
